basics.name: Vera Perry
basics.label: Mortgage Banking Executive Analyst
basics.summary: Focused Operations Manager successful in contract negotiation and process improvement. Remains calm and poised even in high-pressure   situations. Leverages in-depth knowledge of industry trends and shifts to offer valuable insights on opportunities for new growth and expansion.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for escalated issues and problem solving providing support by answering inquiries for Internal and External Partners, Senior Management and Third Party Customers relating delinquent mortgage accounts with the intent to bring delinquent accounts current...

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Research accounts when needed to resolve delinquency & payment issue that has been applied incorrectly and issue credits when needed...

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Was responsible for customer communications to make to scheduled payment arrangements to bring past due accounts current...
